description: Seal kaomojis are some of the cutest ones there are. There is something about their simplicity that brings out their gentle, playful, and cute nature. They look best with giant, watery eyes using that ◕ character. Otherwise, it is important to use a character like ᴥ for the nose and mouth to really make it look like a seal.  (ᵔᴥᵔ) (◕ᴥ◕) ᵔᴥᵔ ◕ᴥ◕ (^ᴥ^) ^ᴥ^ ᶘ ͡°ᴥ͡°ᶅ
title: Seals
